Introducing Long Text Summarizer - Your Efficient Text Summarization Chrome Extension!

Large Text Summarizer is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to summarize large Texts quickly and easily. With the ability to process Texts as long as 1000 pages or containing 300,000 words, this extension provides you with concise summaries in seconds.

Features:

Summarize Large Texts: Enter any Text and let Long Text Summarizer extract the essential information for you.
Choose Summary Size: Customize the size of your summary by selecting from options like little, medium, or full.
Choose Language: One can get the summary in 15+ languages.
Read or Download Summaries: Access your generated summary within the extension for easy reading or download it for offline use.
Trusted by Professionals:
Long Text Summarizer is trusted by a wide range of professionals, including companies, law firms, government agencies, and hospitals. Our software has been praised for its ability to save time and provide quick insights into large Texts.

Unlimited Summarization:
Leveraging the power of GPT-4 AI, Text Summarizer offers unlimited summarization capabilities. You can summarize as many Texts as you want without any limitations.

Privacy and Security:
We prioritize your privacy. Text Summarizer ensures that your Texts and summarized content remain secure and protected.


Discover Long Text Summarizer now and unlock the ability to summarize Text/PDF/DOCX Files with ease. Simplify your Text analysis and save valuable time. Get started with Text Summarizer today!
